statements: UPDATE fair_trade_supply_chain SET product_name='Coffee', supplier_name='FairBeans Co.', fair_trade_certification=TRUE WHERE id=1;
UPDATE fair_trade_supply_chain SET country_of_origin='Ethiopia', product_name='Tea', supplier_name='Ethical Farms Ltd.', fair_trade_certification=FALSE WHERE id=2;
UPDATE fair_trade_supply_chain SET product_name = 'Organic Coffee', supplier_name = 'Green Beans Co.', country_of_origin = 'Colombia', fair_trade_certification = TRUE WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE fair_trade_supply_chain SET supplier_name = 'Eco-Friendly Farms', product_name = 'Organic Tea', fair_trade_certification = FALSE, country_of_origin = 'India' WHERE supplier_name = 'Green Beans Co.';
UPDATE fair_trade_products SET rating = 4.5, price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York', certification_status = TRUE WHERE supplier_id = 456;
UPDATE fair_trade_products SET price = 19.99, rating = 4.5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET certification_status = TRUE, location = 'California' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE FairTrade_Companies SET location='New York' WHERE company_name='Company A';
UPDATE Suppliers SET fair_trade_certified=true, contact_person='John Doe' WHERE supplier_id=3;
UPDATE FairTrade_Companies SET location = 'London' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE fair_trade_practices SET certification_status = FALSE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_information SET contact_person_name = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE fair_trade_practices SET product_name = 'Organic Coffee', certification_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_information SET contact_email = 'info@example.com', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE producers SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = 99.99, name = 'New Product Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE producers SET location = 'New Location', certification_status = TRUE WHERE id = 5;
